# Building Python Package

## Description

A simple calculator to study how to build a package

## Installation

Use the package manager [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/) to install package_name

```bash
pip install calc_kevin
```

## Usage

```python
from project.calc import *
 
sum(1, 11)
sub(1, 10)
mul(2, 12)
div(34, 2)
exp(10, 2)
root(4, 2)

```
